snippet: Job openings soared 8 percent to 5.75 million, the most since records began in 2000, the Labor Department said.
abstract: Labor Department reports job openings rose 8 percent in July to 5.75 million.
lead_paragraph: Job openings soared 8 percent to 5.75 million, the most since records began in 2000, the Labor Department said.

headline.main: Number of Open Jobs Surges, but Employers Are Hiring Less
headline.print_headline: Number of Open Jobs Surges, but Employers Are Hiring Less
